Key: (S-Sorry, Kotori! I can't pick up right now!)
(I promised that today, I would stay with Tohka.)
...All right!
Hm. Did you not get a call from Kotori?
Ah, it's fine. I'm sure it's not important.
I see. If that is so, then it's fine.

More importantly, Tohka! P-Picking up where
we just left off...
Hmm...?
I-I also want to... stay with you always, Tohka.

I-I'm not just talking about now! F-From
now on, too―!
...! I-I am, well... a big eater, you know?

Yeah! I want to try eating different things
more with you, Tohka!

There is still so much I don't know. I will
probably cause you a lot of trouble. Is that
okay?

Yes! From now on, let's go on even more
adventures!

B-But still, I... I am not a regular human, no?
It is possible that I may lose control, even so...

Your powers have saved me a bunch of times,
right? Besides, whenever danger comes when
you lose control, I'll stop you. Every time.

Painful times, sad times, happy times, fun times.
Everything that happens from here on, I want to
experience with you, Tohka.

I want to keep walking together with you,
always—
Urf!
Augh!
Ah, aah...
T-Tohka?
Achoo!
Aaah! Jeez! See!
Pfffff, hahahahaha!
H-Hey, Tohka!

Shido! I will always be by your side!
You and I, we'll be the same as the penguin...
Um...
A couple of lovebirds, huh?
Correct! We shall become a "couple of lovebirds"!

...! Ah, yeah, you're right! If it's us, with you
Tohka, I'm sure...
Achoo!

Aah, Tohka?! You're seriously gonna catch a cold
so let's head for the back. You'll get soaked
again!
Yes, you're right! Ahahahahaha!

(Good grief. Though I was concerned for her,
happiness coursed through me as I uttered the
word Now" with Tohka.)"

(I never want to forget this feeling.
I swore it.)

(Surrounded by the people most important
to us, today, we step in a new direction.)
Tohka, feeling okay?

Leave it to me, Shido. My skill with a blade is
still unmatched, you know?
That's true. Haha.
Yes! Ahahaha!
Marriage isn't the end of the road. This, I know.

From now on, life awaits Tohka and me.
No doubt there'll be plenty of fun times,
but there will also be many hardships.

I'm not sure if Tohka and I could ever become
a pair of lovebirds, like the penguins we saw,
but...
This is wonderful, Shido.
Yeah. Everyone came, after all.
I am so happy, Shido.
Yeah, I can barely wait.
(This is the happiest day of my life.)
Shido...?
Hm?
I just wanted to say your name. Hehe.
I-I see... Um, Tohka?
What is it, Shido?
I wanted to say yours, too. Haha.
I see. Then... Shido?

(Ah. At this rate, it might not end unless I
give up first. That's Tohka, ever so stubborn.)
...I love you!
Y...Yeah! I love you, too.
Yes!

(Goodness, Tohka's amazing. Always so
straightforward.)
Tohka?
Hm, what is it?
Promise me you'll be with me forever.

Yes, leave it to me! I am still inadequate, but
let us work on it together, yes?
Sure, leave it to me!
Hrm! Copying me again, are you?
Haha. Can I not?
W-Well, it's not like you can't, but...
Hahahaha!

I wonder who it was, who mentioned that
marriage" isn't gazing at someone, but rather

Operator: facing in the same direction as them."

Key:
From this day forth, there are things waiting for
me that I can't possibly imagine. With Tohka, I'm
sure they can be overcome. Nothing will stop us.

We will both face the future together, walking
hand in hand.

We'll always be together, Tohka. I promise.
Your heart is in my hand.

Yes! Shido, you and I will always be together!
Even if you tried to flee, I wouldn't let you!
